name: scalops
description: Scalops - AWS Cost Explorer with OAuth Authentication

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:user" "npm run start:client"
scripts.start:client: cd client && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server/auth-service && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install && cd ../../client && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:auth && npm run lint:user && npm run lint:client
